text: Annona praetermissa (also called wild sour sop) is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Jamaica. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Description== Its pollen is shed as permanent tetrads.Walker JW (1971) Pollen Morphology, Phytogeography, and Phylogeny of the Annonaceae. Contributions from the Gray Herbarium of Harvard University, 202: 1-130. ==References== praetermissa Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Endemic flora of Jamaica Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Annona praetermissa
